creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: blue funnel-shaped form at left with darker blue crescents and yellow interior; pink upside-down heart form at right with darker prink crescents; black dots on ground
markings: below image in pencil: A.P. | LRC stamp: KENJI NAKAHASHI / NEW YORK
medium: Etching with hand coloring on paper
signed: below image in pencil: \"Man and Woman\" / K. Nakahashi | LRC in pencil: 1978
title: Man and Woman
